verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Prince of Heaven, King of all
He descended from His throne
Into the world, The Son of God
Was born in my frame
He bore the cross,
Despised the shame
Clothed in sin,
His robe was stained
And by His blood,
Now I am free, now I am saved

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For my Jesus paid the highest price
The Lamb of God was crucified
And He deserves my love,
He deserves my life
For Jesus paid the highest price
Amen

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
{Oh, and there’s no greater sacrifice
Lord, I’m laying down my life
I surrender all,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All of Heaven held its breath
And creation mourned His death
But then Jesus rose
And now that He lives,
I am alive,
